exec: let {tickets_URL, clients_URL, reviews_URL, comments_URL, products_URL, agents_URL} = jsonData;
tests["Gets the correct tickets url"] = tickets_URL === ticketsURL;
tests["Gets the correct clients url"] = clients_URL === clientsURL;
tests["Gets the correct reviews url"] = reviews_URL === reviewsURL;
tests["Gets the correct comments url"] = comments_URL === commentsURL;
tests["Gets the correct products url"] = products_URL === productsURL;
tests["Gets the correct agents url"] = agents_URL === agentsURL;
